# BookmarkFile.get_applications method

```csharp
public static IntPtr get_applications(IntPtr bookmark, string uri, out ulong length, 
    out IntPtr error)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| bookmark | Transfer ownership: none |
| uri | Transfer ownership: none |
| length | Transfer ownership: full |
| error | Pointer to an error or IntPtr.Zero |

## Return Value

Transfer ownership: full
